title: Vela
description:
Meet Vela: A new way to explore and share travel recommendations. Vela started from a personal frustration—planning our honeymoon, my wife and I realized how clunky traditional travel planning was. Endless tabs, scattered notes, no easy way to save or share great finds.

🌍 Discover destinations aligned with your travel style.
🍽️ Find and save restaurants, hotels, and experiences.
📍 Organize recommendations into lists, accessible on-the-go.

We're excited to hear your feedback!
